General.Name: Zhejiang Hisoar Pharmaceutical Co Ltd
General.Description: Zhejiang Hisoar Pharmaceutical Co., Ltd. operates as a pharmaceutical company in China and internationally. The company offers antibiotics, cardiovascular products, hypoglycemic products, fine chemicals, dyes, intermediates, and other products, as well as clindamycin products. It also provides pharmaceutical, dyestuff, and other related services. The company was founded in 1966 and is based in Taizhou, China.
General.Address: No. 100, Waisha Branch Road, Taizhou, China, 318000
